title: George Washington country
creator_credit: United States Information Agency, Frost Productions and Edmund Frost
brief_description: George Washington was born in the area shown in this film in 1732. Scenic and historical spots of central eastern United States included are Mt. Vernon, Philadelphia, Washington DC. and Colonial Williamsburg. George Washington became the first American hero through his character and deeds in this area during the Revolutionary War.
